name: Verify that all root library folders are available through projects-service. [3] folderType=COHORT
description:
When aep-gateway makes the call to /ui/folders/libraries, there is a series of underlying promises
to projects-service that will grab the root folder with the api call used in this test.
aep-gateway will populate the root folder map with the results of these promises if they are fulfilled.
If projects-service cannot return the root folder in this test, then gateway won't be able to load
them into Substantiate.

DATA_VIEW and DATA_VIEW_DRAFT folder types are excluded because they are not relevant for Substantiate.

If the other test fails, check if this one is working to attempt to isolate the issue.

Note that COHORT_JOB, RESULT_JOB, and CUSTOM_OUTPUT share the same root folder id. All of these
correspond to the job folder.

steps.name: When: Call projects-service getFolderTree() for COHORT
Then: Verify that the response is not null

labels.name: story
labels.value: All library folders should be available through projects-service.

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Verify that the folders' tables have been seeded correctly.
